Description:
Detects all variations of obfuscated powershell IEX invocation code generated by Invoke-Obfuscation framework from the following code block

Author: Daniel Bohannon (@Mandiant/@FireEye), oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invoke-Obfuscation Obfuscated IEX Invocation
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where command re '\$PSHome\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$PSHome\[' and command re '\$ShellId\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$ShellId\[' and command re '\$env:Public\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$env:Public\[' and command re '\$env:ComSpec\[(\s*\d{1,3}\s*,){2}' and command re '\*mdr\*\W\s*\)\.Name' and command re '\$VerbosePreference\.ToString\(' and command re '\[String\]\s*\$VerbosePreference'
